pages.text: Toads are small, non-hostile ambient creatures. They can be tamed by giving them $(item)Rotten Flesh$(). Once tamed, they will follow their owner, unless instructed to sit by interacting with them.$(p)Two tamed toads will breed if fed with Rotten Flesh when they have full health, and if they have not full health, Rotten Flesh will heal them.$(p)A tamed toad's skin color can be changed by using $(item)Dye$() on it.
